mapper.insert: insert into corporation (id, name, address, state, boss, phone, img) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update corporation set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, boss = #{boss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, address, state, boss, phone, img from corporation
